name: CreateDialingPermissionsCountryBulkUpdate
description: Create a bulk update request to change voice dialing country permissions of one or more countries identified by the corresponding [ISO country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

UpdateRequest.description: URL encoded JSON array of update objects. example : `[ { "iso_code": "GB", "low_risk_numbers_enabled": "true", "high_risk_special_numbers_enabled":"true", "high_risk_tollfraud_numbers_enabled": "false" } ]`

$ul: **update_request**: A bulk update request to change voice dialing country permissions stored as a URL-encoded, JSON array of update objects. For example : `[ { "iso_code": "GB", "low_risk_numbers_enabled": "true", "high_risk_special_numbers_enabled":"true", "high_risk_tollfraud_numbers_enabled": "false" } ]`
